channel.title: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic
channel.description: when switching back n forth it should reset the spells setup back to 1 magic and 1 prayer everytime u switch from magic to prayer like classic had it up till very end

item.title: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

[quote=“Jusba, post:28, topic:430342”]2x Sounds a bit risky. I’d go with the tested 1.5x.
Even with 2x the server will be healthy for many years tho. As long as the xp is low enough to make it impossible task to make def noobs then its all good.
No xp reductions, right? That shit was a big part of ruining rsce wild.

btw I heard a rumor yesterday that this wont be even coming out. Deny this plz :).[/quote]
1.5 would be great i would love being up all night training for shit and pking ppl for spots in wilderness would be sick hope its 1.5times or 1.8times if thats possible

Read full topic
item.source: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic

item.title: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic
item.dc:creator: @Jusba Jusba
item.description:
@Jusba wrote:

2x Sounds a bit risky. I’d go with the tested 1.5x.
Even with 2x the server will be healthy for many years tho. As long as the xp is low enough to make it impossible task to make def noobs then its all good.
No xp reductions, right? That shit was a big part of ruining rsce wild.

btw I heard a rumor yesterday that this wont be even coming out. Deny this plz :).

Read full topic
item.source: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic

item.title: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:26, topic:430342”][quote author=fran ta the brah link=topic=533024.msg3911402#msg3911402 date=1328760089]

So is this server really gonna be like rsc? 1x xp and so on?
Been waiting another server like rscd for over 4 years now… Time goes fast.

Rsc just doesn’t work with higher xp rates :/.

yes 2 times xp no subs and everything like classic going to be sick
[/quote]1.5 times xp no subs and everything like classic, proven to work, rscd[/quote]
angel worked too with slightly higher rates

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:22, topic:430342"][quote author=fran ta the brah link=topic=533024.msg3910828#msg3910828 date=1328723510]

If I can decipher the message correctly. When switching from the prayer tab to the magic tab, the previous tab is reseted to the top of the list.
example I put on 31 prayer and leave the scroll there, I press the magic tab to mage a bit and want to turn 31 prayer off, I would have to
scroll down the prayer list disable it again.
[/quote]I’m sorry but that’s how it works in RSC :).
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PU-q6m55yK0

how i loved it thanks for video hope they also fix 10 sec logging to where if u get away u can log after 10 secs

That’s how it was in RSC… sigh…[/quote]
o i meant to say like when run from a fight u can log after 10 secs if they miss on angel formula u have to stand still

Read full topic
item.source: Prayer and magic book for moparclassic

If I can decipher the message correctly. When switching from the prayer tab to the magic tab, the previous tab is reseted to the top of the list.
example I put on 31 prayer and leave the scroll there, I press the magic tab to mage a bit and want to turn 31 prayer off, I would have to
scroll down the prayer list disable it again.
[/quote]I’m sorry but that’s how it works in RSC :).
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PU-q6m55yK0

how i loved it thanks for video hope they also fix 10 sec logging to where if u get away u can log after 10 secs[/quote]
That’s how it was in RSC… sigh…
